availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Henry County, Kentucky, carpenter. Virginia native. Married to Mary Murphey. Father of Lucy Murphey, Susan Murphey, William Murphey, Elizabeth Murphey, and Florence Murphey. Carpenter in Henry County in 1850. House carpenter in Henry County in 1860. Employed Madison Luckett as a carpenter in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, District 2, p. 456A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, Newcastle, p. 244.
